verses.verse: הוֹד֣וּ <S%H3034><s%> ho-Du O give thanks לַ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD קִרְא֣וּ <S%H7121><s%> kir-'U call בִּשְׁמ֑וֹ <S%H8034><s%> bish-Mo; upon his name הוֹדִ֥יעוּ <S%H3045><s%> ho-Di-'u make known בָ֝עַמִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> va-'am-Mim, among the people עֲלִילוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H5949><s%> a-li-lo-Tav. his deeds

שִֽׁירוּ־ <S%H7891><s%> shi-ru- Sing ל֭וֹ lo זַמְּרוּ־ <S%H2167><s%> zam-me-ru- unto him sing psalms ל֑וֹ lo; שִׂ֝֗יחוּ <S%H7878><s%> ·chu unto him talk בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol of all נִפְלְאוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H6381><s%> nif-le-'o-Tav. ye of all his wondrous works

הִֽ֭תְהַלְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Hit-hal-lu Glory בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> be-Shem name קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H6944><s%> ka-de-Sho; ye in his holy יִ֝שְׂמַ֗ח <S%H8055><s%> yis-Mach, of them rejoice לֵ֤ב׀ <S%H3820><s%> lev let the heart מְבַקְשֵׁ֬י <S%H1245><s%> me-vak-Shei that seek יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

דִּרְשׁ֣וּ <S%H1875><s%> dir-Shu Seek יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD וְעֻזּ֑וֹ <S%H5797><s%> ve-'uz-Zo; and his strength בַּקְּשׁ֖וּ <S%H1245><s%> bak-ke-Shu seek פָנָ֣יו <S%H6440><s%> fa-Nav his face תָּמִֽיד׃ <S%H8548><s%> ta-Mid. evermore

זִכְר֗וּ <S%H2142><s%> zich-Ru, Remember נִפְלְאוֹתָ֥יו <S%H6381><s%> nif-le-'o-Tav his marvellous works אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah; that he hath done מֹ֝פְתָ֗יו <S%H4159><s%> mo-fe-Tav, his wonders וּמִשְׁפְּטֵי־ <S%H4941><s%> u-mish-pe-tei- and the judgments פִֽיו׃ <S%H6310><s%> Fiv. of his mouth

זֶ֭רַע <S%H2233><s%> Ze-ra' O ye seed אַבְרָהָ֣ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham of Abraham עַבְדּ֑וֹ <S%H5650><s%> av-Do; his servant בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei ye children יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko of Jacob בְּחִירָֽיו׃ <S%H972><s%> be-chi-Rav. his chosen

ה֭וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu He יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh He [is] the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu; our God בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, [are] in all the earth מִשְׁפָּטָֽיו׃ <S%H4941><s%> mish-pa-Tav. his judgments

זָכַ֣ר <S%H2142><s%> za-Char He hath remembered לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam for ever בְּרִית֑וֹ <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-To; his covenant דָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var the word צִ֝וָּ֗ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah, [which] he commanded לְאֶ֣לֶף <S%H505><s%> le-'E-lef to a thousand דּֽוֹר׃ <S%H1755><s%> Dor. generations

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which כָּ֭רַת <S%H3772><s%> Ka-rat Which [covenant] he made אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with אַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham; with Abraham וּשְׁב֖וּעָת֣וֹ <S%H7621><s%> u-she-Vu-'a-To and his oath לְיִשְׂחָֽק׃ <S%H3446><s%> le-yis-Chak. unto Isaac

וַיַּֽעֲמִידֶ֣הָ <S%H5975><s%> vai-ya-'a-mi-De-ha And confirmed לְיַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> le-ya-'a-Ko the same unto Jacob לְחֹ֑ק <S%H2706><s%> le-Chok; for a law לְ֝יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> le-Yis-ra-'El, [and] to Israel בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> be-Rit covenant עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. [for] an everlasting

לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, Saying לְךָ֗ le-Cha, אֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> 'et-Ten Unto thee will I give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> 'e-retz- the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan חֶ֝֗בֶל <S%H2256><s%> Che-vel, the lot נַחֲלַתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-lat-Chem. of your inheritance

בִּֽ֭הְיוֹתָם <S%H1961><s%> Bih-yo-tom were only מְתֵ֣י <S%H4962><s%> me-Tei When they were [but] a few men מִסְפָּ֑ר <S%H4557><s%> mis-Par; in number כִּ֝מְעַ֗ט <S%H4592><s%> kim-'At, yea very few וְגָרִ֥ים <S%H1481><s%> ve-ga-Rim and strangers בָּֽהּ׃ Bah.

וַֽ֭יִּתְהַלְּכוּ <S%H1980><s%> Vai-yit-hal-le-chu When they went מִגּ֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> mig-Goy from one nation אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to גּ֑וֹי <S%H1471><s%> Goy; nation מִ֝מַּמְלָכָ֗ה <S%H4467><s%> mi-mam-la-Chah, to another from [one] kingdom אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am people אַחֵֽר׃ <S%H312><s%> 'a-Cher. to another

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no הִנִּ֣יחַ <S%H3240><s%> hin-Ni-ach He suffered אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam no man לְעָשְׁקָ֑ם <S%H6231><s%> le-'a-she-Kam; to do them wrong וַיּ֖וֹכַח <S%H3198><s%> vai-Yo-chach yea he reproved עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem their sakes מְלָכִֽים׃ <S%H4428><s%> me-la-Chim. kings

אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- no תִּגְּע֥וּ <S%H5060><s%> tig-ge-'U [Saying] Touch בִמְשִׁיחָ֑י <S%H4899><s%> vim-shi-Chai; not mine anointed וְ֝לִנְבִיאַי <S%H5030><s%> Ve-lin-vi-'ai and do my prophets אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- no תָּרֵֽעוּ׃ <S%H7489><s%> ta-Re-'u. no harm

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra Moreover he called רָ֭עָב <S%H7458><s%> ra-'o for a famine עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; upon the land כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> kal- the whole מַטֵּה־ <S%H4294><s%> mat-teh- the whole staff לֶ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem of bread שָׁבָֽר׃ <S%H7665><s%> sha-Var. he brake

שָׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sha-Lach He sent לִפְנֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Hem before אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish; a man לְ֝עֶ֗בֶד <S%H5650><s%> le-'E-ved, for a servant נִמְכַּ֥ר <S%H4376><s%> nim-Kar [who] was sold יוֹסֵֽף׃ <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef. them [even] Joseph

עִנּ֣וּ <S%H6031><s%> 'in-Nu they hurt בַכֶּ֣בֶל <S%H3525><s%> vak-Ke-vel with fetters; רַגְלָיו rag-lav כרַגְלֹ֑ו <S%H7272><s%> rag-Lo; be able to endure קבַּ֝רְזֶ֗ל <S%H1270><s%> bar-Zel, in iron בָּ֣אָה <S%H935><s%> Ba-'ah was laid נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Sho. he

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- Until עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et Until the time בֹּֽא־ <S%H935><s%> bo- came דְבָר֑וֹ <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Ro; that his word אִמְרַ֖ת <S%H565><s%> 'im-Rat the word יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD צְרָפָֽתְהוּ׃ <S%H6884><s%> tze-ra-Fa-te-hu. tried

שָׁ֣לַח <S%H7971><s%> Sha-lach sent מֶ֭לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech The king וַיַּתִּירֵ֑הוּ <S%H5425><s%> va-yat-ti-Re-hu; and loosed מֹשֵׁ֥ל <S%H4910><s%> mo-Shel him [even] the ruler עַ֝מִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim, of the people וַֽיְפַתְּחֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H6605><s%> Vay-fat-te-Che-hu. and let him go free

שָׂמ֣וֹ <S%H7760><s%> sa-Mo He made אָד֣וֹן <S%H113><s%> a-Don him lord לְבֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> le-vei-To; of his house וּ֝מֹשֵׁ֗ל <S%H4910><s%> u-mo-Shel, and ruler בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all קִנְיָנֽוֹ׃ <S%H7075><s%> kin-ya-No. of all his substance

וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo also came יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El Israel מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; into Egypt וְ֝יַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> ve-ya-'a-Ko, and Jacob גָּ֣ר <S%H1481><s%> gar sojourned בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> be-'e-retz- in the land חָֽם׃ <S%H2526><s%> Cham. of Ham

שָֽׂמוּ־ <S%H7760><s%> sa-mu- They shewed בָ֭ם vam דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei acts אֹתוֹתָ֑יו <S%H226><s%> o-to-Tav; his wondrous וּ֝מֹפְתִ֗ים <S%H4159><s%> u-mo-fe-Tim, among them and wonders בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land חָֽם׃ <S%H2526><s%> Cham. of Ham

שָׁרַ֣ץ <S%H8317><s%> sha-Ratz in abundance אַרְצָ֣ם <S%H776><s%> 'ar-Tzam Their land צְפַרְדְּעִ֑ים <S%H6854><s%> tze-far-de-'Im; frogs בְּ֝חַדְרֵ֗י <S%H2315><s%> be-chad-Rei, in the chambers מַלְכֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4428><s%> mal-chei-Hem. of their kings
